Plot: Ichabod Crane is resurrected and pulled two and a half centuries through time to unravel a mystery that dates all the way back to the founding fathers.
Title: Sleepy Hollow
Writer: Phillip Iscove, Alex Kurtzman, Roberto Orci, Len Wiseman
Actors: Tom Mison, Nicole Beharie, Lyndie Greenwood, Orlando Jones
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 30 nominations.
